name: Please Sine Here
description:
Important: We've got reports that for some people, the menu options don't show up:
- Press S to start story mode.
- Press A to start arcade mode
- Press ESC to exit the game

Important: The html5 build is broken, sadly, so please try our game by downloading the zip!

And now: Let's make some knots in your fingers!

Every time you pass a line, some input is switched around. Can you find out which in time?

Originally we had planned for a lot more types of input, but the amount we have right now can already very much get too complex too handle. And if your're not in control, who is?

Good luck and have fun!
